post.body: soon you'll be rcompeting in the worlds strongest man... but can you handle the competish? http://www.theworldsstrongestman.com/
yeah, bad thing is that you *must* sign up for data as well
@xer0x awesome, http://pirates-of-the-amazon.com/
nokia n95 is mypick for smartphones atm, 5mp camera with 8gb memory, full 640x480 video, I'm thinking of signing for 2 years
the new server is Uther, spent some time in Stranglethorn last night, felt strange not getting ganked
been grinding in stranglethorn, just like back in the old days
dang, are you okay? walking?
the kind with alchohol in it
welcome back!
I hate you for sending that link, don't be suprised if I have a jesus phone the next time you see me
"iPhone has already captured %71 of the mobile browser market" wow, had no idea it was that much
hole retaliation http://tinyurl.com/5cz2sm
thanks for the offer, very much appreciate it. I have been granted asylum at the brown house for now.
now we are all in exile, just like napoleon
NOOOOOOO
what year is it where you are? *Perhaps I'm twittering from the future*!
thx for the update, might have a 'work sleepover'
how are the roads?
ooooo. now spin it...
yup >> http://tinyurl.com/63q2wn
gratz!
back late on Sunday
it's called Invasion, not sure who made it
when it rains it pours
on the future of twitter http://tinyurl.com/6lechy
attempting a switch from drinking lattes to americanos, so far so tastey
quoting YttriumOxide via slashdot, "I consider myself an OS agnostic"
hooray! transfer complete. laundry complete.
character transfer is pending. making the leap to pve.
cellphones in canada still completely suck #crtc
love, http://www.nseries.com/products/n95
playing with new toys http://atworkinthecloud.com
leveled up to 45, calling it quits for today
successfully reinstalled WoW, unfortunately no time to play
2.6gb patch did not finish dl'ing because I'd logged out after an hour. Crap.
oh, now a 2.6gb patch... blah #WoW
watched a LOT of tv tonight
got very drunk last night and now my toothache is gone... note to self...
Retweeting @creativestable: haha funny, grafitti done by geeks http://www.oddee.com/item_96517.aspx hilarious
still drunik
hell of a sunset on vancouver island
opera 10 feels pretty dang fast
slight headache, slight toothache, slightly annoyed
infatuated with David Sedaris http://tinyurl.com/ukwrn
71% has @universalmail thinking...
Retweeting @jeresig: I have seen the future of jQuery and it is the past: http://bit.ly/Z7lw @justinlove @xer0x
product mockups in swift, blaring fleetfoxes
sarah silverman show is really holding together, quote "steve I'm a grown-up! I don't need your permission to worship the devil."
at work making up for some lost time, also avoiding home. sleeping on Ross' sofa tonight if all goes according to plan. rats are stupid.
escaped the rats, in exile at the love nest
quite likely have rats in the ceiling. again. quite likely moving.
not that anyone on twitter needs convincing, but http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/technology/7784908.stm
Listening to The Books, struggling to take my last week of work in 2009 seriously.
made it to the brown house last night, now preparing for an afternoon out in the cold
stranded downtown. is this fate telling me to party?
Watching my second #blueray movie on a gigantic TV... not terribly impressed so far
iPhone + evernote is pretty much the greatest thing ever
Home from the Tropicana, eating almonds and dreaming of tomorrows trip to the Apple store
I should be at tubbydog by now http://www.tubbydog.net
Christopher Plummer makes a pretty good Klingon
Just found a giant panda bear from the 70's in grandma drake's basement http://twitpic.com/wk19
Chaos, suddenly.
Wearing ultimate spiderman party hats in the basement http://twitpic.com/wc1q
Drake sisters kicking ass on Super Smash Bros
Wii showdown, even my dad played! http://twitpic.com/w6x8
At the Drakes with my parents drooling over the smell of ham baking. Mmmmm ham.
Drank most of a bottle if scotch last night and practically dying this morning
Having drinks at the Drakes
On the road, highway 2 is full of giant pickup trucks as usual
Watching Meatloaf's biography, waiting for laundry to finish before we hit the road for Cowtown http://twitpic.com/vlhh
Heading up to Edmonton today, thinking I should have a preist purify my parents car so we don't end up in the ditch...
